mapper.insert: insert into userinfo (id, nickname, name, pw, author, phone, email, birth, sex, address1, address2) values (#{id}, #{nickname}, #{name}, #{pw}, 'user', #{phone}, #{email}, #{birth}, #{sex}, #{address1}, #{address2})

insert into userinfo (id, nickname, name, pw, author, phone, email, birth, sex, address1, address2, compname, compdetail, compnum, compaddress1, compaddress2, compphone) values (#{id}, #{nickname}, #{name}, #{pw}, 'seller', #{phone}, #{email}, #{birth}, #{sex}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{compname}, #{compdetail}, (select nvl2(max(compnum), max(compnum)+1, 1) from userinfo), #{compaddress1}, #{compaddress2}, #{compphone})
mapper.select: select id, pw, name, nickname from userinfo where id = #{id} and pw = #{pw}
select id from userinfo where name=#{name} and phone=#{phone}
select pw from userinfo where id=#{id} and phone=#{phone}
mapper.update: update userinfo set jsid=#{jsid}, validtime=#{validtime} where id=#{id}
update userinfo set validtime = #{validtime} where jsid = #{jsid}
